verses:
Enuigwe gab' ugwo
Nke Chukwu gakwu anyi,
K anyi lo otito
Di ebe Chukwu no.

Enuigwe gab' ugwo Ndi nine cholunu,
Ony' obuna nacho, Genwe -ik' ilu n'enu

Enuigwe gab' ugwo kwe n'okwu nke Chukwu
Chekwiibe n'igelii. M'I deb' iwu Chukwu

Enuigwe gab' ugwo Nwa oko i'nine,
jidide nchekwube! Oge di nwankenke.

Enuigwe gab' ugwo I cholu nkusili
Mgbe iji no n'afufu; Wenite-anya n'enu.

Enuigwe gab' ugwo onwu meghel' uzo
Nkpul' obi je n'enu gabinyelu Chukwu.

Enuigwe gab' ugwo na ngoli n otito
Anuli nk enuigwe ganadi ebebe.

Enuigwe gab' ugwo anya afunene
Na nke nti nunulu ife bu-ifu Chukwu.
